Improvements.Improvement: Use HashSet instead of ArrayList for sessionTypes and sessionNames
Improvements.Description: Instead of using ArrayList for sessionTypes and sessionNames, use HashSet. HashSet is faster for lookup operations and it doesn't allow duplicates. So, you can get rid of the 'contains' check and 'add' operations and directly add the sessionType and sessionName to the HashSet.

Improvements.Improvement: Use HashSet instead of ArrayList for subProfilerIds
Improvements.Change_Diff:
- List<String> subProfilerIds=new ArrayList<String>();
+ Set<String> subProfilerIds=new HashSet<String>();
Improvements.Description: Instead of using ArrayList for subProfilerIds, use HashSet. HashSet is faster for lookup operations and doesn't allow duplicates. So, you can eliminate the 'contains' check and 'add' operations and directly add the subProfilerId to the HashSet.
